Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of creative freedom at its best, has some decent fight sequences, and somewhat compelling (though largely unbelievable) plot twists. It is a fun and light-hearted action-adventure that would greatly appeal to tween audiences.
